data.name: Shadow Arena
data.detailed_description:
Sweeter Than Candy Login Rewards!

May your holidays be merry and...SWEET with the [Taghal] ‘Candy’ Weapon Skin and get a chance to win a Shadow Arena Hoodie!


JOIN OUR DISCORD


Battle Pass - Beta Season 7

Battle Pass returns with a splash with the start of Beta Season 7!
It’s time to earn battle points and get yourself an awesome skin!


About the Game

Step into the battlefield shrouded in darkness. Choose to team up with other players to form a group of 3 or put your skills to the test to become the last one standing. Experience a new style of action PvP where the ferocity of battles and the clashing of weapons echoes across the battlefield.

GAME FEATURES

DIVERSE HERO ROSTER
From sword-wielders to archers and mages to brawlers, select from an array of unique Heroes and master your own playstyle. Dominate your opponents by using skills, chaining combos, or by playing strategic mind games!


Action-pack, Various tactics
Stand victorious by using brilliant skills and cunning!
Dive into the action-packed fights unique to Shadow Arena.


STRATEGIC HUNTS
Implement everything you find on the battlefield into your combat strategy. Seek out monsters that drop powerful gear or buffs, use Altars to summon fearsome dragons and Ancient Weapons, or carefully use consumable items for that extra boost. There's always an opportunity to turn the tides of battle in the arena.

How to Play
Are you a team player or a lone wolf? Shadow Arena has all the modes that suits your game mode. Take on the battle on your own in “Solo” or choose “Trio” to team-up in a group of 3 and devise strategies to dominate the arena.
Feeling bold? Jump into a round of Deathmatch or 1v1 and enjoy different sub-modes that Shadow Arena has to offer!

data.short_description: Shadow Arena is a PvP action battle royale game where you can fly solo or form a group to fight towards claiming victory. Select your Hero and take down enemies with unique skills and strategy to conquer the battlefield engulfed in shadows!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 440 / AMD Radeon 5450 / Intel HD Graphics 4000(Ivy Bridge)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Screen Resolution: 1280x720
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NDVIA GTX 970 / AMD RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Screen Resolution: 1920x1080 or higher
